C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc. is one of the largest global logistics providers in the world, with consolidated total revenues of $17.7 billion in 2024 . Its global suite of multimodal logistics services brings together the expertise of our people with custom technology . The Robinson Operating Model is the foundation of our strategy, execution, and accountability throughout the organization .
 In 2024, our customers trusted us to manage approximately  $23 billion in freight . We are expanding the use of generative AI in our industry, creating proprietary technology to perform work that defied automation for decades . Our global perspective across all links in the supply chain are critical in supporting shippers through market volatility and global supply chain disruptions .
 Robinson Fresh supplies fresh produce through a network of independent produce growers and suppliers . Customers include grocery retailers, restaurants, foodservice distributors, and produce wholesalers . Robinson Fresh has exclusive licensing agreements to distribute fresh and value-added produce under recognized consumer brand names . North American Surface Transportation (NAST) provides transportation and logistics services across North America .
 Global Forwarding provides transportation and logistics services through an international network of offices in North America, Europe, Asia, Oceania, South America, and the Middle East . Robinson Fresh provides sourcing services that primarily include the buying, selling, and/or marketing of fresh fruits, vegetables, and other value-added perishable items .
 We execute these services by investing in and retaining talented employees, developing innovative proprietary systems and processes, and utilizing a network of contracted transportation providers . We make a profit that is driven by the value we provide our customers and the resulting difference between what we charge to our customers for the totality of services provided to them and what we pay to transportation providers to transport the freight .
 C.H. Robinson is a certified Indirect Air Carrier (“IAC) and freight forwarder, we organize air shipments and provide door-to-door service . Our customs brokers are licensed and regulated by U.S. Customs and Border Protection . We provide intermodal transportation service, which is the shipment of freight in containers or trailers by a combination of truck and rail .
 Some of our customers have us handle all, or a substantial portion, of their freight transportation needs . The carrier’s contract is with us, not the customer, and we are responsible for prompt payment of freight charges . Our employees price our services to provide a profit to us for the totality of services performed for the customer .
 We offer a wide range of logistics services on a global basis that reduce or eliminate supply chain inefficiencies . We analyze customers’ transportation rate structures, modes of shipping, and carrier selection . We help customers minimize storage through transloading, crossdocking, drop trailer and other flow-through operations . We suggest ways to improve operating and shipping procedures and manage claims .
 Adjusted gross profits is a non-GAAP financial measure calculated as total revenues less the total of purchased transportation and related services and the cost of purchased products sourced for resale . The table below shows our adjusted gross profits by transportation mode, for the years ended December 31 (in thousands): $1,072,691,691 $1,561,310 $2,486,636 $3,480,669  ($3,052,000)
 During 2024, we served 83,000 customers worldwide, ranging from Fortune 100 companies to small businesses in a wide variety of industries . Sourcing accounted for approximately five percent of our adjusted gross profits in 2024 and 2023 . We seek additional business from existing customers and pursue new customers based on our knowledge of the marketplace and our unique information advantage .
 The transportation services industry is highly competitive and fragmented . We compete against traditional and non-traditional logistics companies . We often compete with respect to price, scope of services, or a combination thereof . We believe that our most significant competitive advantages are: knowledgeable, dedicated, and empowered people act as an extension of our customers’ teams .
 We use our data and data analysts to drive smarter solutions and products for our customers . Our financial strength, discipline, and consistent track record of success are a key foundation of our ability to sustainably meet their needs . Our technology brings the value of artificial intelligence, machine learning, data science, and analytics to our customers in order to help solve their most complex logistics challenges .
 Navisphere gives customers one place to purchase, manage, and track their freight . It allows them to communicate worldwide with parties in their supply chain across languages, currencies, and continents . Navisphere Insight™ uses data science to turn customers’ raw freight data into valuable insights, surfacing trends in transportation performance and spend .
 Navisphere Optimizer helps customers minimize the travel time, distance, and total miles of their freight . It is used during the transportation planning process and dynamically selects the right route with the right mode and right carrier on the right day . Navisphere is integrated into 38 third-party transportation management systems and/or enterprise resource planning systems .
 Freightquote is a web-based, mobile-responsive offering designed to streamline the shipping process for small business customers . Small business customers can go online with their smart phone, tablet, or computer to book their LTL or truckload freight, track shipments, get proactive notifications, and pay for transportation services with a credit card . Navisphere Carrier provides contracted motor carriers access to the functionality necessary to efficiently manage their relationships with C.H. Robinson .
